page.title: 06SYKE ESTATE AND SYKE POND
page.content: When we went to Syke Estate we took a drink with us because it was a hot and sunny day.We looked carefully at the housing and the types of shops that there were.We saw some cottages and some old people's homes. The houses were mainly terraced and many of them were shaded by trees. There was only one shop that was open. We met a man with a very old and rusty car. He said that he liked living in Syke because it is not near to the town centre and there is some beautiful countryside nearby. We went to visit Syke pond and drew pictures of it because it was so attractive. There are two buses that go to Syke, the 441 and the 442.We had a last look at the pond and then we made our way back to school.
